projects.title: Fishbowl CMBox
projects.description: This modern full-stack project was designed to create an asset management platform for storing curated content items and a site builder for displaying content on user-created websites. The solution utilized cutting-edge technologies, including Astro, Svelte, Tailwind, GraphQL, and Redis, to deliver a powerful and user-friendly experience.

projects.title: React based site for a State Government entity
projects.description: This project involved developing and enhancing a React-based website designed to support local businesses in collaboration with a state government. The solution leveraged React, Knockout, Bootstrap, GraphQL, and REST APIs to deliver a user-friendly and accessible platform.

projects.title: Website Enhancements for a City Government entity
projects.description: This project involved working on a municipal website that allows residents to apply for electric services in their city. Tasks were assigned via Azure and ranged from minor updates, such as correcting grammatical errors, to more complex changes, like adding new options to the application form.

projects.title: React based site for a marketing company
projects.description: This project involved building a React-based website for a marketing company, leveraging SCSS and GraphQL to deliver a performant and user-friendly experience. The focus was on developing dynamic content management features and optimizing site performance for both technical and non-technical users.

projects.title: Document Migration for a Tool Manufacturing Company
projects.description: This project involved designing and implementing a backend solution to migrate and organize archived documents for a tool manufacturing company. The goal was to transition files from an outdated system to a new Oracle WebCenter Content instance while optimizing the import and sorting process.
